TopicTitle: Descending and Ascending nodes do not appear on orbit line

Articles.Content: The descending and ascending nodes do not appear on the orbit line once a target has been selected. Going to the tracking station and then controlling a vessel fixes this.
I have had that happen (sort of) but it usually resolved itself if I zoomed in enough on my orbital path/craft as the An/Dn just seemed to be ‘suppressed‘ in their effort to avoid overlapping markers
